verse:
अजामेकां लोहितशुक्लकृष्णां बह्वीः प्रजाः सृजमानां सरूपाः।
अजो ह्येको जुषमाणोऽनुशेते जहात्येनां भुक्तभोगामजोऽन्यः॥
meaning: The unborn, eternal maya consist of रजो सत्व and तमो qualities, multiple/infinite matter and created by her having multiple/infinite forms. There is another unborn, eternal jeev(experiencer) who experiences the maya(experienced) and the one who rules/governs this 2 are different
